title: (x) TOM FORD - what font is this logo? - probably custom, various suggestions {gang}
content:
Hey does anyone know what font Tom Ford's logo is? Also maybe you guys could give me something similar to it if it turns out to be a custom font.

Thanks Thanks Thanks

Here's the link: [http://blog.iso50.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/09/img014-450x82.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215103911/http:/blog.iso50.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/09/img014-450x82.jpg "http://blog.iso50.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/09/img014-450x82.jpg")
author: A-Kortaberria

comments.content:
Oo almost. That one is pretty close. But the 'M' is different. I wonder if they just used Gotham and altered the M themselves.

Thanks anyway.

Pretty close to [Akzidenz Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215103911/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/akzidenz-grotesk-bq/) in some of the Medium weights.

- Mike Yanega

[Came up before](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215103911/http:/www.typophile.com/node/65876), [Proxima Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215103911/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/proxima-sans/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D72%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DTOM%2520FORD%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%26seed%3D33?refby=mfde)/ [Proxima Nova](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215103911/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/proxima-nova/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D72%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DTOM%2520FORD%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%26seed%3D33?refby=mfde) were suggested then.  
 [Ezzo Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215103911/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/ezzo/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D72%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DTOM%2520FORD%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%26seed%3D19?refby=mfde) is also similar.

Or Mark Simonson's [Proxima Nova](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215103911/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/proxima-nova/), even closer.

- Mike Yanega

Beat me to it Florian.

- Mike
Thanks everybody. Yeah it looks like the M was custom. But a couple of those are really good.

Hello

The font is similar with:

[http://www.ffonts.net/Liberation-Sans-Bold.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215103911/http:/www.ffonts.net/Liberation-Sans-Bold.font "http://www.ffonts.net/Liberation-Sans-Bold.font")

Alex.
Wow Liberation sans looks identical almost. Really good font. Thanks!
It also looks like a altered version of Avenir...
